summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for transportation charges related to a shipment. The invoice details the charges incurred, the shipment date, and the recipient's address. It also includes instructions for requesting adjustments to the invoice.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he is responsible for the payment of the transportation charges.

persons.name: George Sanford Francis
persons.context: George Sanford Francis is mentioned as the recipient of a package shipped by Epstein, indicating a connection to the shipment detailed in the invoice.

connections.description: Epstein is the shipper of a package that was sent to George Sanford Francis, indicating a business or personal relationship.

events.title: Package Shipment
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for shipment from Epstein's address.

events.title: Package Delivery
events.description: The package shipped by Epstein was delivered to the recipient.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
keyFacts: The invoice is dated April 16, 2004, and is for transportation charges totaling $94.78.
The shipment was picked up on April 13, 2004, and delivered on April 15, 2004.
George Sanford Francis is identified as the recipient of a package shipped by Epstein.
The invoice includes instructions for requesting adjustments, indicating it is a formal billing document.
The document contains multiple references to Epstein's address, confirming his location at the time.
